# imageView

**Instance Property**

The image view associated with the poster view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageView: UIImageView { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the image view to add additional information, such as overlays or badges, to the main content image. Don’t set an image directly on the image view. Always use the poster view’s [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVPosterView/image] property.

## Configuring a Poster View

- **image**: The image for the poster view.
- **title**: The title for the poster view.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for the poster view.
